/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with trees and lampposts, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, a tall tower with a lattice structure punctuates the skyline, adding a unique architectural element to the cityscape. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, highlighting the vastness of the city and the orderly arrangement of its structures.
